titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and commons, of the City of London, in common-councell assembled. The humble petition of divers citizens of London, who earnestly desire the peace and happinesse of the Parliament, City and kingdome.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Whittington, at the Blew Anchor in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blew Anchor in Cornhill, neer the Royall Exchange
